gen:link.label:label: BV269_2: The item "Catastrophe Risk Charge Factor before risk mitigation" reported in SR.27.01 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Non-life and Health catastrophe risk [RFF/MP/RM] should be equal to the ratio between "Specified Gross Loss" and "Exposure". -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.27.01; Rows: r0400;0410;0420;0430;0440;0441;0450;0460;0461;0470;0480;0490;0500;0510;0520;0521;0530;0540;0550;0560;0570;0580;0590;0600; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0940,c0010}=Reported then {SR.27.01, rNNN,c0070}={SR.27.01, rNNN,c0060}/{SR.27.01, rNNN,c0050}

BV269_2: The item "Catastrophe Risk Charge Factor before risk mitigation" reported in SR.27.01 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Non-life and Health catastrophe risk [RFF/MP/RM] should be equal to the ratio between "Specified Gross Loss" and "Exposure". -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.27.01; Rows: r0400;0410;0420;0430;0440;0441;0450;0460;0461;0470;0480;0490;0500;0510;0520;0521;0530;0540;0550;0560;0570;0580;0590;0600; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0940,c0010}=Reported then {SR.27.01, rNNN,c0070}={SR.27.01, rNNN,c0060}/{SR.27.01, rNNN,c0050}
